category_language_reset_desc: The category language has been reset.
category_language_updated_desc: The category language has been updated to {language}.
channel_language_reset_desc: The channel language has been reset.
channel_language_updated_desc: The channel language has been updated to {language}.
display_guild_shortcuts_desc: These are the server shortcuts in alphabetical order. You can access any given one with the command `{instruction}` (without brackets), e.g. `{example}`.
guild_language_reset_desc: The server language has been reset.
guild_shortcut_added_desc: Server shortcut `{shortcut}` has been added successfully. You can access it by typing `{shortcut_call}`.
guild_shortcut_deleted_desc: Server shortcut `{shortcut}` has been deleted successfully.
user_language_reset_desc: Your user language has been reset.
user_language_updated_desc: Your user language has been updated to {language}.
